entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
